version_description:
We have fixed some minor bugs and improved iOS 7 compatibility.

Thank you for your support. Please keep sending us feature requests and bug reports.
Minor bugfix and overall stability.

We have redesigned the file manager and included support for the iPhone 6 and 6 plus. Now you can easily transfer your projects from and to computer.

This version of My Measures is FREE so you can test it if this is what you are looking for. Advanced features are available with in-app purchase Upgrade to PRO.
But if you find that you donâ€™t need this app just delete it. There is no need for you to give us a 1 star rating because we want to charge you for something that a team of 5 people was working on for more than a year.
- startup crash and export bug-fix for iPad devices
- minor bug-fix and overall improvements
- iOS 9 compatibility
- we have fixed connectivity to Windows PC
- minor bug-fixes

Finally the most anticipated feature has arrived. Top App Cloud is here.
My Measures now supports Top App Cloud service. You can collaborate with your team, use and edit same projects. Get instant sharing and cloud backup. And best of all, all your iDevices are now synced. You can also access your projects from any computer or device via web browser, just go to cloud.topapp.si. Of course you can still use My Measures without Top App Cloud the same way as you did before.

- added delete button in object editor
- minor bug-fixes

- delete button added in edit mode
- photo picker fixed
- now you can import photos from other apps
- minor bug-fixes
- fixed macOS issue
- minor bug-fix
- minor improvements
- fixed iOS 10.3 filename issue
- minor bug fixes

- iPhone X support
- minor bug-fixes

This update brings new AR Measure feature.
When you are in camera mode, on supported devices you can measure things with your camera.
We have also added file name templates.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

- iPhone X support
- minor bug-fixes
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Compatibility with iOS 13
Stability improvements
Fixes an issues where project were opened incorrectly on iPad
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
